document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: ' NY) (FBI)"  
Subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] Re: Call 
Date: Thu, 16 Sep 2021 20:36:17 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.09.15_Court_Subpoenas  _ pdf 
Hello-
Thank you again for the helpful call today. Please do send the business records certification for the 
records you previously provided us. 
As I mentioned, attached is a trial subpoena. If we end up needing you to testify, I'll be in touch in late-October to talk 
about logistics and to do some prep. 
Thanks, 
From 
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 2021 4:13 PM 
To: 
) 
Cc: (NY) (FBI) 
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] Re: Call 
I'm available now. 
Specialist 
Student Records & Subpoenas 
Information Technology Enterprise Applications/Records Management 
On Thu, Sep 16, 2021 at 3:48 PM wrote: 
Hi 
It's a  follow-up conversation to the ones you had with and some of my colleagues about 
subpoenas for student records a few months ago. Happy to explain more on the phone. When is a good time to talk? 
Thanks, 
From 
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 2021 3:41 PM 
EFTA00017881

To: 
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] Re: Call 
What is it about? 
Specialist 
Student Records & Subpoenas 
Information Technology Enterprise Applications/Records Management 
FAX
-
On Thu, Sep 16, 2021 at 3:04 PM wrote: 
Thank you, Is there a time that works best for you? 
Thanks, 
Fro 
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 2021 1:14 PM 
To: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] Re: Call 
Okay 
Specialist 
Student Records & Subpoenas 
Information Technology Enterprise Applications/Records Management 
FAX 
PX 
> 
On Thu, Sep 16, 2021 at 10:46 AM wrote: 
Hello 
I hope you're doing well. I think a few months back you spoke with my colleague, 
Do you have a few minutes sometime for a short follow up call? We are generally available today if that works for 
you. 
Thank you, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00017882

1 Saint Andrews Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Disclaimer: Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released 
in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone 
or in writing. 
Disclaimer: Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in 
response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in 
writing.
